title: Deploy and Scale Web Application on Kubernetes
description: Create deployment, scale replicas, expose service, verify pods running

steps.instruction: Create nginx deployment with 3 replicas in production namespace
steps.expected_outcome: Deployment nginx-web created with 3/3 pods running

steps.instruction: Check status of all nginx-web pods
steps.expected_outcome: Pod running with 1/1 containers ready, events show successful start

steps.instruction: Expose nginx deployment as LoadBalancer service on port 80
steps.expected_outcome: Service nginx-service exposed with external IP assigned

steps.instruction: Scale deployment to 5 replicas for increased traffic
steps.expected_outcome: Deployment scaled to 5/5 replicas, all pods running

success_criteria: 5 nginx pods running, service accessible via LoadBalancer
cleanup: kubectl delete deployment nginx-web -n production && kubectl delete service nginx-service -n production
